import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; export default function Profile() { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('info'); // 'info', 'history', or 'billing' const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({ firstName: 'John', lastName: 'Doe', phone: '123-456-7890', email: 'john.doe@example.com', // Add other fields as necessary country: '', streetAddress: '', city: '', region: '', postalCode: '', cardType: '', cardName: '', cardNumber: '', expirationDate: '', cvv: '', }); const [orderHistory, setOrderHistory] = useState([ // Example order history { id: 1, item: 'Ticket A', date: '2023-01-01' }, { id: 2, item: 'Ticket B', date: '2023-02-01' }, // Add more orders as needed ]); const handleUserInfoChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setUserInfo((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Update user information logic here console.log('Updated User Info:', userInfo); }; // Function to render the address form const renderAddressForm = () => (

); // Function to render the card information form const renderCardInformationForm = () => (

); return ( <>
